oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Suyūṭī , 1445-1505

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written from one to four columns, from 17 to 19 lines per page, in black.
According to the colophon (f. 10r), copy completed on 14 Jumadá al-Ākhirah 975 AH [December 15, 1567 AD].
Bound with: Hādhihi al-qaṣīdah al-musammāh bi-Lāmīyat al-ʻajam / lil-Ṭughrāʼī (ff. 1v-3r).
MS Arab 376. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabic poetry--1258-1800
Arabic language--Grammar
